channel.title: Specify custom alert senders
channel.description:
It would be very interesting to allow other mail account than the main one to send mail alerts.
Alerts are used across different projects and are very useful. Use an mail account relative to each "project" to send mail alerts to project partners would clarify things to alerts recipients.

item.title: Specify custom alert senders

item.description:
I misunderstood your request

Reading too quickly this morning without enough coffee.

item.title: Specify custom alert senders

item.description:
Thank you Jesse,
Maybe I missed something but I can only specify destination addresses, not sender’s one.
Am I wrong ?
